text: 1.14 Luk 21.28, Lom 8.23, 2 Ko 1.22, 1 Pi 2.9 God ned takaw aglɨl agak, Tap teplep yad okok, binɨb yad okok kɨlop ñɨnɨgayn agak. Anɨb ak chɨn God Kawnan ne ak dɨpun okok, chɨn nopun, God tap teplep ne okok mɨdupsek dɨnɨgabun. Anɨb ak tek chɨn nopun, God binɨb ne okok kɨlop pɨsnep dek kɨm amnɨgabal. Anɨb ak nɨm, yɨb awl ñɨl yɨb nop dad aplanɨgabun.
